original_title: US push to build naval drone fleet ‘not going well’ – Reuters — RT World News
article_summary: US abstains from condemning Russia for the 2008 war with Georgia at the UN, breaking past practices. This decision, criticized by Georgian officials, comes as US President Trump seeks to mediate an end to the Ukraine conflict and improve relations with Russia. Meanwhile, Bolivian President Luis Arce accuses the US of using the war on drugs as a pretext to control Latin America and exploit its resources.</s>
